name: Modifications to agreement
text:
§88-214  Modifications to agreement.  The state agency may enter into such modification or modifications to the agreement as may be necessary to transfer members of the part of a divided retirement system which is composed of the members of the system who have not expressed a desire for coverage under the Social Security Act to the part of the system which is composed of the members who have expressed a desire for the coverage in accordance with section 218(d)(6)(F) of the Social Security Act. [L 1959, c 194, §1; Supp, §6-191.6; HRS §88-214]
 
Attorney General Opinions
 
 In view of section, not necessary to amend this part to provide coverage for police officers originally excluded; but necessary to modify agreement, following prescribed procedures.  Att. Gen. Op. 75-19.
